content: By: Russ Jones March 20, 2020 Getting Smarter with SERPs Search Engines | Whiteboard Friday | Local SEO Modern SERPs require modern understanding, and that means paying close attention to location and how it affects rankings. Learn about getting data that represents true traffic in this edition of Whiteboard Friday. Read this post By: Alex Ratynski March 16, 2020 A Beginner’s Guide to Ranking in Google Maps Local SEO The majority of your potential customers still use Google to find local businesses near them. In fact, 80% of searches with “local intent” result in a conversion. This begs the question: “What’s the best way to catch the attention of local searchers on Google?” The answer: through Google Maps marketing. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis March 3, 2020 Heart, Ear, Eye, Mind, Mouth: Local SEO Exercises for Your Least Technical Clients Local SEO Instead of signaling via SEO, CTR, USPs, and GMB, let’s relax with clients by relating successful local search marketing practices to experiences people at any level of technical proficiency already understand. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis January 6, 2020 2020 Local SEO Success: How to Feed, Fight, and Flip Google Local SEO | Search Engines Feed Google the right information, fight spam, and flip it into an opportunity: these are the top 3 ways to chase local SEO success in 2020. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis December 16, 2019 6 Local Search Marketing DIY Tips for the Crafting Industry Local SEO The $44 billion crafting industry is ready for a marketing revamp. If you market a local business within this niche, Miriam Ellis has 6 pro tips for you to prepare for an even more fruitful 2020. Read this post By: Mary Bowling December 6, 2019 The Local Algorithm: Relevance, Proximity, and Prominence Local SEO | Whiteboard Friday How does Google decide what goes into the local pack? In this week's Whiteboard Friday, renowned local SEO expert Mary Bowling lays out the three factors that drive Google's local algorithm in a simple and concise way anyone can understand. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis December 2, 2019 Simple Spam Fighting: The Easiest Local Rankings You’ll Ever Earn Local SEO Google is overrun by spam in its local listings. How can you begin to fight back? Miriam Ellis shares simple tactics and smart strategy to overcome it. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis November 13, 2019 Building a Local Marketing Strategy for Franchises [Guide Sneak Peek] Local SEO Franchises know how to market at the national level, but often lack the tools for reaching their local consumers. What they need is marketing plan capable of scaling from national priorities to hyperlocal customers — this excerpt from our guide explains how. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis November 4, 2019 Have Your Agency’s Clients Considered a Local Product Kiosk? Google Has. Local SEO There's a quiet opportunity in local SEO that could mean a conveniently unique competitive advantage for your clients: local product kiosks. Google has confirmed that these are eligible for listings apart from the main business page — could they be right for you? Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 29, 2019 The Unique World of Franchise Marketing [Guide Sneak Peek] Local SEO Your agency can better serve franchises by having a plan that respects their differences from corporate or SMB clients. Are you ready to draft a strategy that draws on the strengths of both franchisors and franchisees? Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 28, 2019 Take the 2019 Local Search Marketing Industry Survey Local SEO It's almost 2020 (where does the time go?) and we're back with our second annual Local Search Marketing industry survey! If you market a local business, lend us your thoughts and be entered to win a Visa gift card. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 16, 2019 The Practical Guide to Franchise Marketing: How People Buy Now Local SEO Franchises face unique challenges when it comes to local marketing. Customers no longer shop the same as they did 5 or 10 years ago. Learn how franchises can think locally to meet new shopping habits head-on. Read this post By: Miriam Ellis October 2, 2019 The 2019 Holiday Checklist for Local SEO Heroes Local SEO A lot of time and care goes into crafting happy holiday customers. Download the free updated Local SEO Holiday Checklist to make sure your agency is ready to attract (and keep) more customers this season! Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers September 24, 2019 Google Review Stars Drop by 14% Search Engines | Local SEO On September 16, Google announced that they would be restricting review stars in SERPs. According to our data, page-1 SERPs with review stars dropped 14% over a two-day period, with much larger drops in Real Estate and Finance. Read this post
